releaseNotes:
What's New in Shift Beta 1.1.0

Advanced Security & Privacy

Privacy & Security Hub: A new dedicated section to manage your app security.
Screenshot Security: Request permission to disable screenshots in a chat.
Biometric Vault: Secure your Encrypted Vault with biometrics.
Two-Way Deletion: Blocking a user deletes the chat for both users.

Vault Improvements

Move to Vault: Adding a photo deletes it from your gallery.
Export from Vault: Export photos back to gallery.
Biometric Auto-Unlock: Vault prompts for biometrics automatically.

Chat & Friends

Friend Removal: Blocking removes from friends list.
Disappearing Messages: 5s, 10s, 1m, 5m timers.
Graceful Handling: No crash if chat deleted while open.
Scrollable Updates: What's New popup is scrollable.

Enhancements

Mute Notifications.
Clear Chat.
Performance improvements.
